text: kintu jis kisee ko gulaam praapt na ho to vah nirantar do maah roze rakhe, isase pahale ki ve donon ek-doosare ko haath lagaen aur jis kisee ko isakee bhee saamarthy na ho to saath muhataajon ko bhojan karaana hoga. yah isalie ki tum allaah aur usake rasool par eemaanavaale siddh ho sako. ye allaah kee nirdhaarit kee huee seemaen hai. aur inakaar karanevaale ke lie dukhad yaatana hai
